text: Hi@ChrisHMSG  I am planning to use my SRS fund to invest either in Dimensional or Lion global S&P 500. Would like to clarify  does these funds have US withholding tax? Also is there any capital gain tax applicable in SG?

Hi Chris  RSTU upon retirement  we are not able to draw out these amounts. What about Voluntary Contributions to 3 CPF accounts? Any restriction on that?

VC3A has no restrictions on withdrawalJust to clarify on the withdrawal part. Most of the RSTU funds will be reserved and go to the RA  unless your SA is 100% made up of RSTU funds  and hence above Frs  those can be withdrawn
Hi Chris  had completed endowus sign up using your link. Just want to check that for buying lion global us 500 using CPF OA  my agent bank (DBS) will charge per buy trade and also quarterly fee?
What about OA trf to SA? Is it considered?
I think he mentioned if OA transfer to SA  once the amount hit retirement sum  the excess can be drawn out. No restriction. Inside his video. The only concern will be the RSTU portion
All VC3A l  VCMA and OA transfer SA can withdraw above FRS.RSTU funds mostly go to RA at 55 (thats why can't withdraw)
So RSTU purpose is to build that RA base so that your VC and transfer can all withdraw
